Scripts.OnLeave: GameTooltip:Hide();
GameTooltip:Hide();
GameTooltip:Hide();
GameTooltip:Hide();
Scripts.OnClick: if this:GetChecked() then GF_AddRemoveSearch(this:GetName(), getglobal(this:GetName().."TextLabel"):GetText(), true) else GF_AddRemoveSearch(this:GetName(), getglobal(this:GetName().."TextLabel"):GetText(), nil) end if GF_AutoAnnounceTimer and string.find(this:GetName(),"LFG") then GF_TurnOffAnnounce(GF_AUTO_ANNOUNCE_SETTINGS_CHANGED) end

Scripts.OnLeave: GameTooltip:Hide(); GF_ResultItem_Hover_Off(this:GetParent());
GameTooltip:Hide(); GF_ResultItem_Hover_Off(this:GetParent());
GameTooltip:Hide(); GF_ResultItem_Hover_Off(this:GetParent());
GameTooltip:Hide(); GF_ResultItem_Hover_Off(this:GetParent());
GF_ResultItem_Hover_Off(this,this:GetID());

Scripts.OnClick: if arg1 == "LeftButton" then if IsShiftKeyDown() then if not GF_SavedVariables.showchattexts then GF_SavedVariables.showchattexts = true DEFAULT_CHAT_FRAME:AddMessage(GF_CHAT_ON) else GF_SavedVariables.showchattexts = nil DEFAULT_CHAT_FRAME:AddMessage(GF_CHAT_OFF) end GF_ShowChatCheckButton:SetChecked(GF_SavedVariables.showchattexts); else GF_ToggleMainFrame() end else if GF_GroupsInChatCheckButton:GetChecked() then GF_SavedVariables.showgroupsinchat = nil; DEFAULT_CHAT_FRAME:AddMessage(GF_CHAT_GROUP_OFF) else GF_SavedVariables.showgroupsinchat = true; DEFAULT_CHAT_FRAME:AddMessage(GF_CHAT_GROUP_ON) end GF_GroupsInChatCheckButton:SetChecked(GF_SavedVariables.showgroupsinchat); end
Scripts.OnLeave: GameTooltip:Hide();

Scripts.OnClick: if not GF_GroupFilterDropdownMenu:IsShown() then GF_GroupFilterDropdownMenu:Show() else GF_GroupFilterDropdownMenu:Hide() end
Scripts.OnLeave: if not GetMouseFocus() or not GetMouseFocus():GetName() or (GetMouseFocus() and GetMouseFocus():GetName() and not string.find(GetMouseFocus():GetName(), "GF_GroupFilter")) then GF_GroupFilterDropdownMenu:Hide() end

if not GetMouseFocus() or not GetMouseFocus():GetName() or (GetMouseFocus() and GetMouseFocus():GetName() and not string.find(GetMouseFocus():GetName(), "GF_GroupFilter")) then GF_GroupFilterDropdownMenu:Hide() end

GameTooltip:Hide();
if not GetMouseFocus() or not GetMouseFocus():GetName() or (GetMouseFocus() and GetMouseFocus():GetName() and not string.find(GetMouseFocus():GetName(), "SearchList")) then GF_SearchList:Hide() end
if not GetMouseFocus() or not GetMouseFocus():GetName() or (GetMouseFocus() and GetMouseFocus():GetName() and not string.find(GetMouseFocus():GetName(), "LFGHardCore")) then GF_LFGHardCore:Hide() end

Scripts.OnClick: if GF_SavedVariables.mainframestatus == 1 then GF_SavedVariables.mainframestatus = 0 GF_ToggleMainFrame(3) else if GF_SavedVariables.mainframestatus == 0 then local _,_,_,xpos, ypos = GF_MainFrame:GetPoint() GF_SavedVariables.MainFrameXPos = xpos GF_SavedVariables.MainFrameYPos = ypos end GF_SavedVariables.mainframestatus = 1; GF_ToggleMainFrame(3) end

if GF_SavedVariables.mainframestatus == 2 then GF_SavedVariables.mainframestatus = 0 GF_ToggleMainFrame(3) else if GF_SavedVariables.mainframestatus == 0 then local _,_,_,xpos, ypos = GF_MainFrame:GetPoint() GF_SavedVariables.MainFrameXPos = xpos GF_SavedVariables.MainFrameYPos = ypos end GF_SavedVariables.mainframestatus = 2; GF_ToggleMainFrame(3) end

if GF_AutoAnnounceTimer then GF_TurnOffAnnounce(GF_AUTO_ANNOUNCE_TURNED_OFF) else if GF_LFGDescriptionEditBox:GetText() ~= "" then GF_TurnOnAnnounce() else DEFAULT_CHAT_FRAME:AddMessage(GF_NOTHING_TO_ANNOUNCE2, 1, 1, 0.5) end end

if GF_PerCharVariables.lfgshown then GF_PerCharVariables.lfgshown = nil else GF_PerCharVariables.lfgshown = true end GF_LFGWhoUpdateOffset() GF_UpdateMainFrameHeight() GF_UpdateMainFrameWidth() GF_UpdateMainFrame() GF_UpdateWhisperFrame() GF_UpdateResults()

if GF_PerCharVariables.getwhoshown then GF_PerCharVariables.getwhoshown = nil else GF_PerCharVariables.getwhoshown = true end GF_LFGWhoUpdateOffset() GF_UpdateMainFrameHeight() GF_UpdateMainFrameWidth() GF_UpdateMainFrame() GF_UpdateWhisperFrame() GF_UpdateResults()
if not GF_GetWhoClass:IsShown() then GF_ShowDropdownList("GetWhoClass") else GF_GetWhoClass:Hide() end

Scripts.OnEditFocusGained: if GF_LFGDescriptionEditBoxHasFocus[2] + .005 < GetTime() then GF_LFGDescriptionEditBoxHasFocus = {true,GetTime()}; end this:HighlightText(string.len(this:GetText())+1);

Scripts.OnValueChanged: if this:GetValue() > 10 then GF_SavedVariables.announcetimer = (this:GetValue()-10)*300 + 600; getglobal(this:GetName().."BottomLabel"):SetText((GF_SavedVariables.announcetimer/60).." -"..GF_MINUTES) else GF_SavedVariables.announcetimer = this:GetValue()*60; getglobal(this:GetName().."BottomLabel"):SetText((GF_SavedVariables.announcetimer/60).." -"..GF_MINUTES) end if GF_AutoAnnounceTimer then GF_AnnounceToLFGButton:SetText(GF_ANNOUNCE_STOP_ANNOUNCE.."-"..GF_SavedVariables.announcetimer - GF_AutoAnnounceTimer) end

Scripts.OnClick: if not GF_LogFilterDropdownMenu:IsShown() then GF_LogFilterDropdownMenu:Show() else GF_LogFilterDropdownMenu:Hide() end
Scripts.OnLeave: if not GetMouseFocus() or not GetMouseFocus():GetName() or (GetMouseFocus() and GetMouseFocus():GetName() and not string.find(GetMouseFocus():GetName(), "GF_LogFilter")) then GF_LogFilterDropdownMenu:Hide() end

if not GetMouseFocus() or not GetMouseFocus():GetName() or (GetMouseFocus() and GetMouseFocus():GetName() and not string.find(GetMouseFocus():GetName(), "GF_LogFilter")) then GF_LogFilterDropdownMenu:Hide() end

Scripts.OnClick: if not GF_LogChannelFilterDropdownMenu:IsShown() then GF_LogChannelFilterDropdownMenu:Show() else GF_LogChannelFilterDropdownMenu:Hide() end
Scripts.OnLeave: if not GetMouseFocus() or not GetMouseFocus():GetName() or (GetMouseFocus() and GetMouseFocus():GetName() and not string.find(GetMouseFocus():GetName(), "GF_LogChannelFilter")) then GF_LogChannelFilterDropdownMenu:Hide() end

Scripts.OnClick: GF_SavedVariables.logchannels = this:GetChecked() if GF_SavedVariables.logchannels then GF_LogFilters["CHANNEL"] = true else GF_LogFilters["CHANNEL"] = nil end if GF_WhisperLogCurrentButtonID == 0 then GF_DisplayLog() end

GF_SavedVariables.logparty = this:GetChecked() if GF_SavedVariables.logparty then GF_LogFilters["PARTY"] = true GF_LogFilters["RAID"] = true GF_LogFilters["RAID_LEADER"] = true GF_LogFilters["RAID_WARNING"] = true GF_LogFilters["BATTLEGROUND"] = true GF_LogFilters["BATTLEGROUND_LEADER"] = true else GF_LogFilters["PARTY"] = nil GF_LogFilters["RAID"] = nil GF_LogFilters["RAID_LEADER"] = nil GF_LogFilters["RAID_WARNING"] = nil GF_LogFilters["BATTLEGROUND"] = nil GF_LogFilters["BATTLEGROUND_LEADER"] = nil end if GF_WhisperLogCurrentButtonID == 0 then GF_DisplayLog() end

GF_SavedVariables.logguild = this:GetChecked() if GF_SavedVariables.logguild then GF_LogFilters["GUILD"] = true GF_LogFilters["OFFICER"] = true else GF_LogFilters["GUILD"] = nil GF_LogFilters["OFFICER"] = nil end if GF_WhisperLogCurrentButtonID == 0 then GF_DisplayLog() end

GF_SavedVariables.logwhisper = this:GetChecked() if GF_SavedVariables.logwhisper then GF_LogFilters["WHISPER"] = true GF_LogFilters["WHISPER_INFORM"] = true else GF_LogFilters["WHISPER"] = nil GF_LogFilters["WHISPER_INFORM"] = nil end if GF_WhisperLogCurrentButtonID == 0 then GF_DisplayLog() end

GF_SavedVariables.logsay = this:GetChecked() if GF_SavedVariables.logsay then GF_LogFilters["SAY"] = true else GF_LogFilters["SAY"] = nil end if GF_WhisperLogCurrentButtonID == 0 then GF_DisplayLog() end

GF_SavedVariables.logyell = this:GetChecked() if GF_SavedVariables.logyell then GF_LogFilters["YELL"] = true else GF_LogFilters["YELL"] = nil end if GF_WhisperLogCurrentButtonID == 0 then GF_DisplayLog() end

GF_SavedVariables.loghardcore = this:GetChecked() if GF_SavedVariables.loghardcore then GF_LogFilters["HARDCORE"] = true else GF_LogFilters["HARDCORE"] = nil end if GF_WhisperLogCurrentButtonID == 0 then GF_DisplayLog() end

Scripts.OnLeave: if not GetMouseFocus() or not GetMouseFocus():GetName() or (GetMouseFocus() and GetMouseFocus():GetName() and not string.find(GetMouseFocus():GetName(), "GF_LogChannelFilter")) then GF_LogChannelFilterDropdownMenu:Hide() end

Scripts.OnClick: if GF_ConvertMessagesToLinks then GF_ConvertMessagesToLinks = nil GF_ConvertLogMessagesToURL:SetText(GF_LOG_CONVERT_URL) else GF_ConvertMessagesToLinks = true GF_ConvertLogMessagesToURL:SetText(GF_LOG_RESET_MESSAGES) end if GF_WhisperLogCurrentButtonID == 0 then GF_DisplayLog() elseif GF_WhisperLogCurrentButtonID == 1 then GF_WhisperHistoryDisplayLog("Guild") else GF_WhisperHistoryDisplayLog(getglobal("GF_WhisperHistoryButton"..GF_WhisperLogCurrentButtonID):GetText()) end
GF_SavedVariables.joinworld = this:GetChecked(); if GF_SavedVariables.joinworld then GF_JoinWorld(); else LeaveChannelByName(GF_CHANNEL_NAME) end

Scripts.OnHide:
GF_LFGSize:Hide() GF_LFGLFM:Hide() GF_LFGDungeon:Hide() GF_LFGRaid:Hide() GF_LFGRole:Hide() GF_GetWhoClass:Hide() GF_SearchList:Hide() GF_GetWhoFrame:Hide() GF_LFGFrame:Hide() GF_MessageFrame:Hide() GF_LogFilterDropdownMenu:Hide() GF_GroupFilterDropdownMenu:Hide() GF_ChatFilterDropdownMenu:Hide() GF_LFGHardCoreDropdown:Hide()
GF_SavedVariables.mainframeishidden = true GF_SavedVariables.mainframestatus = 0 if pfUI and pfUI.chat and pfUI.chat.urlcopy then pfUI.chat.urlcopy:SetWidth(270) pfUI.chat.urlcopy.text:SetWidth(250) end
